name: Beef Taco Noodle Casserole
author: Pam Cooking Spray
summary: Egg noodle casserole recipe with seasoned ground beef, Southwest vegetables, tomatoes and cheese.
ingredients: 1  serving PAM® Original No-Stick Cooking Spray
6 ounces dry extra-wide egg noodles, uncooked
2 cups frozen Southwest mixed vegetables (corn, black beans, red peppers)
1 (10 ounce) can Ro*Tel® Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, undrained
1 ¼ cups shredded Mexican blend cheese
¼ cup thinly sliced green onions
directions: Spray 13x9-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray
Place uncooked noodles in baking dish
Heat large skillet over medium-high heat
Add beef; cook 5 to 7 minutes or until crumbled and no longer pink
Add vegetables, undrained tomatoes, enchilada sauce and water to skillet; stir
Cover dish tightly with foil; bake 15 minutes
Stir; sprinkle with cheese and cover with foil
Bake 10 minutes more or until noodles are tender
Serve with sour cream, if desired
